content.caption: Scratch uses snap-together blocks to build programs

content.text: Scratch is a visual programming language that lets you create interactive stories, games, and animations by snapping blocks together—no syntax errors!

items: Stage: the canvas where sprites live
Events: start actions (e.g., green flag clicked)
Variables: store values like score or speed

content.text: When green flag clicked → forever → move 10 steps → if on edge, bounce
